item.description: @iC True. Moving forward in version is fast and keeps local data. Backwards takes a little longer and wipes local data. I never keep any data local on a Chromebook that isn‚Äôt available somewhere else.
item.source:markdown: @iC True. Moving forward in version is fast and keeps local data. Backwards takes a little longer and wipes local data. I never keep any data local on a Chromebook that isn‚Äôt available somewhere else.

item.description: @MaxWinebach Appreciate that info! I may look at Cuts next time but TBH, I rarely buy clothes. Just keep what I need in the closet for a good 10 days and that‚Äôs it. Literally 10 T-shirts. (My wardrobe would fit in 280 characters ü§™) I‚Äôm a fan of TenTree shirts - I have 3 hanging now.
item.source:markdown: @MaxWinebach Appreciate that info! I may look at Cuts next time but TBH, I *rarely* buy clothes. Just keep what I need in the closet for a good 10 days and that‚Äôs it. Literally 10 T-shirts. (My wardrobe would fit in 280 characters ü§™) I‚Äôm a fan of TenTree shirts - I have 3 hanging now.

item.description: 5 new T-Shirts going in the wardrobe today (after first wash), 5 old ones getting donated tomorrow. #minimalism Too late for me now but: any thoughts on Bylt shirts? https://t.co/EKLlGICHTz

item.description: @marksimi Thanks, Mark! Everyone, of course, is different. So what works (or doesn‚Äôt work) for me doesn‚Äôt apply to everyone. Hopefully, the article makes people think about their optimal learning methods so they can make better continuing education choices. Cheers!
item.source:markdown: @marksimi Thanks, Mark! Everyone, of course, is different. So what works (or doesn‚Äôt work) for me doesn‚Äôt apply to everyone. Hopefully, the article makes people think about their optimal learning methods so they can make better continuing education choices. Cheers!

item.description: ‚ÄúThe average rate on the popular 30-year fixed mortgage fell to 5.22% on Thursday from 5.54% on Wednesday, when the Fed announced its latest rate hike, according to Mortgage News Daily. The rate fell even further Friday to 5.13%.‚Äù https://t.co/4OF2lJsWLR

item.description: @mellowrich If you're just going to use it for basic browsing and maybe the occasional Android app, it will work fine. Slow by comparison to current Chromebooks, but fine. I suspect you could install Chrome OS Flex on it to keep getting software updates; you'll lose Android though.
item.source:markdown: @mellowrich If you're just going to use it for basic browsing and maybe the occasional Android app, it will work fine. Slow by comparison to current Chromebooks, but fine. I suspect you could install Chrome OS Flex on it to keep getting software updates; you'll lose Android though.

item.description: Trying some more traditional digital camera photography for a bit instead of using a smartphone. Kind of miss the ‚Äúold school‚Äù tech. Dug out the Sony NEX-6 from 2012 and used its Wi-Fi (!) to transfer a few test shots to the iPad Pro for light edits. https://t.co/KACPHSBGSX
